    Gary Cziko - Without Miracles*

    Nov 18, 2015

    Gary Cziko 1995. Without Miracles. Universal selection theory and the second Darwinian revolution Cambridge, Massachusetts: MIT Press. 385 pp.

    A bit too “opinionated-philosophy” from a quick skim . Low priority to read.

    ^

    A lightly edited version of the Pithy Theme for jekyll.
